title: ID Fonts @ Win
content:
Dear Friend,  
Howmany fonts are used in [http://typophile.com/files/QBFonts.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/typophile.com/files/QBFonts.pdf "http://typophile.com/files/QBFonts.pdf") ?  
Name them @ win a copy of QalamBartar  
 [http://Typophile.com/files/QB.swf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/typophile.com/files/QB.swf "http://Typophile.com/files/QB.swf")  
 [http://Typophile.com/files/QB.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/typophile.com/files/QB.pdf "http://Typophile.com/files/QB.pdf")

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/QB_4401.PNG)
  
The first to name the fonts is the winner.  
 [http://www.macarabia.net/threads/35844/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/www.macarabia.net/threads/35844/ "http://www.macarabia.net/threads/35844/")  
Deadline @ Result: 2015.04.04 = 1394.01.15  
Happy Contesting

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [QB.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/typophile.com/files/QB.pdf) | 152.19 KB |
| [QBFonts.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/typophile.com/files/QBFonts.pdf) | 76.11 KB |
author: AzizMostafa

comments.content: Hope QB (Tool + fonts) answer the aspirations of [Arabs](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/qafilah.com/ar/%D9%81%D9%86-%D8%AA%D8%B5%D9%85%D9%8A%D9%85-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%AD%D8%B1%D9%81-%D8%A7%D9%84%D8%B9%D8%B1%D8%A8%D9%8A/) and [Jawi-loving Fans](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/blog.daltonmaag.com/arabic-latin-logo-matchmaking-workshop/)
I am hoping the same best work from you in the future as well. [High Page Rank Backlink](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317224247/http:/good-backlink.com/)
